   290 North D Street  
   San Bernardino, CA 92401
   
   Phone: 909-998-2000 (SB Direct)

   Friday: 7:30 am to 4:30 pm

   Monday through Thursday: 7:30 am to 5 pm  
   Friday: 7:30 am to 4 pm
